library(tidyverse)
library("ggplot2")

#import raw data
drugs <- read.csv("~/Dropbox/Medizin/Forschung/Aktuelle Forschungsprojekte/CLL CPS1000/analysis/drugCategory_modified.csv", sep=";")
drugs

#wrangling
df <- drugs |> 
  filter(Drug != "")
df  

as.factor(df$Pathway)

# plot
barplot <- df |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = factor(Pathway)))
  
Fig2a <- barplot + geom_bar(aes(fill = type)) + 
theme_classic() +
scale_fill_brewer(palette = "PuRd",  direction = 1) +
labs(y="Number of drugs", x="", fill="Drug type")+
theme(axis.text.x = element_text(color="black", angle = 45, hjust=1, vjust=1, size=8), axis.text.y = element_text(size=8), axis.title.y = element_text(size=8), legend.title = element_text(size=8, face="bold"), legend.text=element_text(size=8), axis.line = element_line(size = 0.5), legend.key.size = unit(0.5, 'cm'), plot.margin=margin(r=1,t=1,l=1,unit="cm"))+
scale_y_continuous(expand = c(0.01,0), breaks=c(1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8))+
scale_x_discrete(expand = c(0.025,0))

Fig2a
